content.webTitle: A Radio Four Analysis programme reveals religion

fields.headline: Hey mister, that's me up on the jukebox
fields.bodyText: An Analysis programme I made earlier this year, and which was first broadcast in the spring, has been repeated this week. There is a broadcast this evening at 9.30 and it should be on the iPlayer for a few days after that. It's wrong to boast, but this does contain, towards the end, the most moving five minutes of radio I have ever recorded. They even ended up on Youtube with a ghastly inspirational picture in front of them.
